name: In Sky
description:
In Sky

In this game, I create a maze, which will not be so easy to pass through. Try to find the exit on a simple green path. Follow the red path if you didn't even feel the difficulty of the first path. Well, at the end you will be waiting for a deadly path, where you will suffer from the loss of time spent searching for a way out. It will be interesting. Support the project if you liked it. Then you will see the update soon, you will be able to continue your path of passage.
